original_text: Othniel attacked the city and he took it. He was the son of Caleb's brother, Kenaz. So Caleb gave his daughter Acsah to Othniel, to be his wife.
korean_text: 갈렙의 아우 그나스의 아들인 옷니엘이 그것을 점령함으로 갈렙이 자기 딸 악사를 그에게 아내로 주었더라

sentences.original_text: He was the son of Caleb's brother, Kenaz
So Caleb gave his daughter Acsah to Othniel
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 갈렙은 자기 디 악사를 오스니엘에게 주었습니다
